name: Visual Studio Resources File
summary: Learn about .RC2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: RC2 files can also be used as includes within RC files. If this is done, the RC2 file can act as a shared library between projects.

description: Developer file used by Visual Studio, a software development program for Windows; saves resources, such as icons, bitmaps, and user interface components; differs from an .RC file because Visual Studio's Resource Compiler does not manage the resources in the RC2 file.
